# Accessing the Connections Add-in from the Outlook desktop client {#addingoutlookemailstofiles .task}

The Connections Add-in features are available as buttons on the Outlook ribbon.

The Connections Add-in features are available as buttons on the Outlook ribbon. The buttons shown will differ depending on whether you are in a reader view looking at received emails, or in a compose view creating a new email. Selecting any of the buttons will show a sidebar with that feature.

In the reader view, ‘Upload’ and ‘Show Profiles’ buttons are available in the Home ribbon tab:

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

In the compose view, the ‘Add File’, ‘Upload File’, and ‘Add Recipients’ buttons are available in the Message ribbon tab:

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

**Parent topic:**[Using the HCL Connections Add-in for Microsoft Outlook](../../connectors/enduser/c_ms_plugins_add_in_outlook.md)
